sentences.en: " Did you find a suitor for your daughter? "
sentences.cn: “ 你给你闺女找了个婆家? ”

sentences.en: E: No one can be at once suitor and judge!
sentences.cn: 任何人不能同时成为原告与法官!

sentences.en: Every suitor had to sign a contract agreeing to these conditions.
sentences.cn: 每一位求婚者都必须签一份契约,同意以上这些条件.

sentences.en: Is Barclays a good choice of suitor?
sentences.cn: 巴克莱会是个好选择 吗 ?

sentences.en: My mother had a suitor who adored her.
sentences.cn: 我的母亲曾有一位爱慕她的求婚者。

sentences.en: No one can be at once suitor and judge.
Of course , before the war, Will would certainly not have been an eligible suitor.
sentences.cn: 在战前威尔当然不是个合格的求婚者.

sentences.en: Pomona's shyest suitor was the wood - god Vertumnus.
sentences.cn: 在波蒙娜的爱慕者中,最显腼腆的一位是树神维特姆诺斯.

sentences.en: The company was making little progress in trying to find a suitor.
sentences.cn: 该公司试图找到一家收购公司，但进展甚微。

sentences.en: The new judge is 50-year-old David Suitor who's regarded as a conservative.
sentences.cn: 新法官是50岁的戴维·休特,他被视为右翼人士.

sentences.en: The persistent suitor made persistent efforts and succeeded eventually.
sentences.cn: 这个百折不挠的未婚者经过执着的努力,终于如愿以偿.

sentences.en: They had considered her suitor ambitious and upwardly mobile.
sentences.cn: 他们认为她的追求者抱负不凡,积极进取.

sentences.en: This is a great way to meet a suitor.
sentences.cn: 这是遇到佳偶的好办法.

sentences.en: Whatever is offered by the bank is unlikely to be improved on by any rival suitor.
sentences.cn: 其他竞争收购方不大可能开出比这家银行更高的价码。

words.tran_cn: 求婚者；请愿者；[法]起诉人

trans.tran_en: a man who wants to marry a particular woman
